about_the_game:
Are you ready to pump up your hotel? Well, you can flex your business biceps in the Gym Furniture Set. Customize the hotel gym room to attract more guests who want to stay fit and healthy.

Choose from a variety of furniture and equipment, such as treadmills, dumbbells, yoga mats, benches, mirrors, and more. Customize your gym with different colors, styles, and layouts to match your hotel's theme and your guests' preferences. Don't miss this chance to make your hotel the ultimate destination for health, wellness, and fitfluencers. Get the Gym DLC pack today and Feel! That! Burn!!

The Gym Furniture Set contains the following DLC:

- New objective: renovation of the gym
- 5 lockers
- 7 holders
- 7 trainers
- 5 training benches
- 4 mirrors
- 4 barbell
- 4 barbell bar
- 12 dumbbell
- 5 weights
- 1 Treadmill
- 1 Back extension
- 1 Exercise bike
- 1 Power tower
- 1 Pulldown machine
- 1 Bench

name: Hotel Renovator - Gym Furniture Set

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Hotel Renovator - Gym Furniture Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 X4 / Intel Core i3-4130
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 / Geforce GTX 750 Ti - 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS, 1920x1080 in low.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500 X / Intel Core i7-6700K
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / GTX 1070 Ti - 8 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS, 1920x1080 in epic.

short_description: Are you ready to pump up your hotel? Well, you can flex your business biceps in the Gym Furniture Set. Complete your new objective to customize the hotel gym with plenty of options and attract fitfluencers from around the world.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian, German, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
